verses.1: Topa phat un. Topaʼ tungah la thak sa un. A thuman miteʼ kikhopna sungah amah phatna sa un.
verses.2: Amah a Bawlpa tungah Israel lungdam henla, amauʼ Kumpipaʼ tungah Zion mite kipak tahen.
verses.3: Lamna tawh amah phat unla, khuang le laiza lasakna tawh ama tungah la ngaih sa un.
verses.4: Bang hang hiam cih leh ama mite tungah Topa lungdam a, miniamte gualzo sakin a pahtawi hi.
verses.5: A gualzawhna uh ah thuman mite lungdamin diang uh henla, ama mai ah khukdinin nuamna la sa uh hen.
verses.6: Minam dangte tungah phu la-in gim a pia ding, a kumpite uh sikkhau tawh henin a mi liante uh sikkol a bulh ding, a kigelh sa thukhenna bangin amaute tungah a sem khia dingin lang nih a hiam namsau a tawi kawmun Pasian phatin awng ta uh hen. Hih pen Pasianʼ miteʼ gualzawhna ahi hi. Topa phat un.
